name: Head Bandaging
description: Triangular bandage technique for head wounds
warning: For head wounds with bleeding. Apply pressure first to control bleeding.
emergency_notes: Do not remove objects embedded in wound
Monitor for signs of head injury

steps.title: Position the Bandage
steps.description: Put the triangular bandage on the head with the longest edge over the forehead.
steps.voice_prompt: Place the triangular bandage on the head with the long edge over the forehead.

steps.title: Cross the Tails
steps.description: Cross over the long tails using firm pressure.
steps.voice_prompt: Cross the long tails at the back of the head using firm pressure.

steps.title: Tie in Front
steps.voice_prompt: Bring the tails to the front and tie in the middle of the forehead.

steps.title: Secure the End
steps.description: Secure spare end with safety pin. If there is no safety pin, perform a square knot.
steps.voice_prompt: Secure the spare end with a safety pin or square knot.
steps.critical_warning: To perform a square knot: hold the ends with each hand, put the right end over the left and tie, then put the left end over the right and tie

steps.title: Monitor the Patient
steps.description: Check for signs of worsening bleeding or head injury. Seek medical attention.
steps.voice_prompt: Monitor for bleeding and head injury signs. Seek immediate medical attention.
steps.critical_warning: Seek professional medical care for all head wounds
